nodes.text: Tatooni Junko was a beverage served by chefs of the Hutt species during the reign of the New Republic. The Human scholar Ebenn Q3 Baobab recommended the drink as one of his favorites in the Galactic Phrase Book & Travel Guide, which he authored in 6 ABY. He suggested that his readers try the drink if they should visit any of the Huttese restaurants in the spaceport Mos Eisley on the planet Tatooine. The beverage was listed with his other favorite Huttese cuisine in the Huttese language section of his guide, which warned readers that the drink was somewhat mind-relaxing.
Tatooni Junko was first mentioned in the Galactic Phrase Book & Travel Guide, which was written by Ben Burtt in 2001.
